properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anywhere - Anywhere Fear I cannot know Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anywhere with Jesus I can safely go Anywhere He leads me In this world below Anywhere without Him Dearest joys would fade Anywhere with Jesus I am not afraid{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anywhere with Jesus I am not alone Other friends may fail me He is still my own Though His hand may lead me Over dreary ways Anwhere with Jesus Is a house of praise{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anywhere with Jesus I can go to sleep When the darkling shadows Round about me creep Knowing I shall waken Never more to roam Anywhere with Jesus Will be home sweet home{/lang-eng}
